tracks.title: Blue Hour Echo
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Pillow's gone cold on the other side
Nowhere left for me to hide
Ceiling stares back, a field of white
Cut in half by pale blue light
Streetlamp's drawing tracings on the wall
Waiting for a call that's not a call
And I ask the empty space beside my head
All the words I should have said

[Chorus]
Oh, the blue hour echo
Is the only sound I know
It's the beat behind the beat, quiet and slow
Just the sound of my own thoughts, soft and low
Fading in, fading through
Hello, me... hello, you

[Verse 2]
Static hums on the window glass
Watching hazy silhouettes pass
Every ghost I used to know
Puts on another quiet show
The vinyl hiss inside my brain
Washes out just like the rain
And I trace the dust that dances in the beam
Living out a waking dream

[Chorus]
Oh, the blue hour echo
Is the only sound I know
It's the beat behind the beat, quiet and slow
Just the sound of my own thoughts, soft and low
Fading in, fading through
Hello, me... hello, you

[Bridge]
Is this a kind of peace I've found?
This quiet, hollow, sacred ground?
Or is it just a slow release
From a world that will not cease?
This voice that answers in the grey
Does it want me to run or stay?

[Chorus]
It's the blue hour echo
The only sound I really know
A rhythm in the blood, quiet and slow
The hum of my own thoughts, soft and low
Fading in, fading through
Hello, me... it's only you

tracks.title: Urban Nocturne (도시 야상곡)
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Three A.M. on the window pane
A silver sketch of falling rain
Each shaky line, a liquid track
On a night that won't give morning back
The city breathes a quiet sigh
Beneath a sleeping, velvet sky
And in this hush, I'm the only sound
On holy, empty, silent ground

[Chorus]
This is my Urban Nocturne
A song the lonely streetlights learn
The world outside is washed in gray
And built for me to drift away
The beat is slow, the bass is deep
A promise that the shadows keep
This fragile stage, this glowing ache
A city sleeping for my sake

[Verse 2]
A distant sign, a faded stain
A smudge of magenta in the rain
It melts and bleeds across the glass
A ghost of moments meant to pass
The guitar shimmers, clean and low
Reflecting light on the pavement's glow
Each chord a question, soft and clear
On why I'm still awake and here

[Chorus]
This is my Urban Nocturne
A song the lonely streetlights learn
The world outside is washed in gray
And built for me to drift away
The beat is slow, the bass is deep
A promise that the shadows keep
This fragile stage, this glowing ache
A city sleeping for my sake

[Bridge]
They call it solitude, I know
But in this calm, my feelings grow
It isn't lonely, it's just true
A world reduced to me and you
Oh, sleeping city, in your dream
You flow like a forgotten stream
And I'm just here to watch you run
Until the coming of the sun

[Chorus]
And sing my Urban Nocturne
A song the lonely streetlights learn
The world outside is washed in gray
And built for me to drift away
The beat is slow, the bass is deep
A promise that the shadows keep
This fragile stage, this glowing ache
A city sleeping for my sake

tracks.title: Porcelain Stillness
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Streetlights paint a faded square
On the kitchen wall tonight
White ceramic, holding darkness there
A pool of bitter light
The city hums a single note
A quiet, sleeping gray
And I just watch the seconds float
And drift and fade away

[Chorus]
Just a circle, black and deep
In this porcelain stillness
Secrets that the silence keep
Is it freedom, or is it loneliness?
A single wisp of pale blue steam
A quiet, rising thread
Lost inside a waking dream
With the words I never said

[Verse 2]
Hear that quiet, jazzy line
A thought that starts to trace
A question that is only mine
In this solitary space
Remember when the world was loud?
A rush of sound and speed
Now I'm standing in a silver cloud
Planting a single seed

[Chorus]
Just a circle, black and deep
In this porcelain stillness
Secrets that the silence keep
Is it freedom, or is it loneliness?
A single wisp of pale blue steam
A quiet, rising thread
Lost inside a waking dream
With the words I never said

[Bridge]
And I find a strange and simple grace
In the echo of my own heartbeat
My reflection in this liquid space
Is the only one I meet
There's no answer I have to find
No reason and no rhyme
Just the comfort of my own mind
Suspended here in time

[Outro]
Porcelain stillness
Yeah...
Just this stillness
Fading now...
Just this...

tracks.title: Fluorescent Dreams
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Pale blue light on the window pane
Hums a rhythm through the rain
Just my shadow on the seat
Fading lines, incomplete
Empty platform, lonely name
Every echo sounds the same
Carriage sways to a phantom beat
Beneath the pulse of sleeping streets

[Chorus]
In these fluorescent dreams, I'm on the midnight line
Losing all the track of forgotten space and time
This metallic, soft-spun lullaby
Is the only reason why
I feel alive under this humming sky
Drifting by

[Verse 2]
Concrete towers, soft and blurred
A quiet promise, never heard
Every station, not a word
Just a ghost that goes unstirred
No destination in my head
Only looping thoughts instead
A million stories sleeping sound
While I am drifting underground

[Chorus]
In these fluorescent dreams, I'm on the midnight line
Losing all the track of forgotten space and time
This metallic, soft-spun lullaby
Is the only reason why
I feel alive under this humming sky
Drifting by

[Bridge]
And the bass just walks a steady pace
Reflecting nothing on my face
Is this freedom, or just grace?
To disappear without a trace
In the rhythm of this place...

[Chorus]
In these fluorescent dreams, I'm on the midnight line
Losing all the track of forgotten space and time
This metallic, soft-spun lullaby
Is the only reason why
I feel alive under this humming sky
Drifting by

tracks.title: Static Lullaby
tracks.lyrics:
[Drone]
Pillow white.
White.
White.
Eye open.
Blue light.
Blue light bleed.
One pixel... buzzing.

[Melody_Corrupt]
Hush now... hush n-n-n-now...
Close the... close th// ERROR //
Sleep sound... sleep s-s-s-s-s-
(a music box wound too tight)
(the teeth are grinding)
(grinding)

[Burst_01_Cache]
CLICK. REFRESH. CLICK. REFRESH.
GHOST DATA GHOST DATA
THUMB SCROLL THUMB SCROLL
LOOP.
LOOP.
LOOP.
THE FACE I WORE IN 2009.
JPG.
JPG.
JPG.
ERASE?
404 SELF NOT FOUND.
ERASE?
CLICK-CLICK-CLICK-CLICK-CLACK-CLACK-CLACK-

[Silence_Fragment]
...a whisper in the fan... sounded like a notification...

[Burst_02_Receipt]
SEEN.
SEEN.
SEEN.
A BLUE TICK IS A TOMBSTONE.
SEEN.
S-S-S-S-S-SEEN.
THEY READ IT. THEY KNOW. THEY KNOW. THEY KNOW.
ARCHIVE. DELETE. ARCHIVE. DELETE.
BINARY HEARTBEAT.
ZERO ONE ZERO ONE ZERO
(panic arrhythmia)
ONEONEONEONEONEONEONE

[Spoken Word_Static]
The ghost is not in the house.
The ghost is in the cloud.
It rains data.
It pours old conversations.
I am haunted by the backup of myself.
A phantom limb with a phantom phone.
Still scrolling.

[Collapse]
PILLOW WHITE BLUE LIGHT SEEN SEEN SCROLL JPG GHOST DATA HUSH NOW CLICK CLICK CLICK CLICK //FATAL_EXCEPTION//

[CUT]
STTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTATIC.

tracks.title: Porcelain Static
tracks.lyrics:
[Static Field]
STATIC.
STATIC.
STATIC.
Pressure-hum. A quiet so loud.
Glass still.
Night air thick.
Empty.

[Fracture]
Chip.
Crack.
(tap-tap-glitch)
Shard of sound. Porcelain beat.
Porcelain beat.
Stutter-click. Stutter-click.
A ripple.
Just one.
(pale blue)
Lost.

[Drop]
EMPTY FULL EMPTY FULL
COMPANION HISS
ALL NOISE
ONLY NOISE
SURFACE BREAKS
SURFACE BREAKS
BLUE FRACTURE

[Spoken Word]
The lonely sine. A pale blue thought, adrift on a frequency of nothing.
You invite the noise in to drown the other noise.
The mind, a ghost in the machine.
The machine, a friend.
A constant.
This engine of static... is a strange sort of peace.
The beat never lands.
The ripple never settles.
Never...
still.

tracks.title: Echoes in Orbit
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Drawn in lines of graphite space
Tracing arcs I can't erase
Got this slow-wave in my core
Always wanting something more
Just a soft Rhodes in the haze
Living out my sleepless days

[Chorus]
And I send a signal through the night
Just a single pulse of lonely light
Can you hear my echo in the orbit?
A quiet sound, you just ignore it
Just a whisper lost inside the black
A love you'll never broadcast back

[Verse 2]
Watch your tiny world unfold
A story I am never told
Through a window made of glass
I see the seasons slowly pass
You don't know I'm up above
Suspended in this phantom love

[Chorus]
And I send a signal through the night
Just a single pulse of lonely light
Can you hear my echo in the orbit?
A quiet sound, you just ignore it
Just a whisper lost inside the black
A love you'll never broadcast back

[Bridge]
If my frequency should fade
A memory I never made
Would the silence feel the same?
Would you ever speak my name?
Or am I just a tear that's frozen
On a path I haven't chosen?

[Outro]
(My echo... in the orbit...)
(Lonely light...)
(My echo... can't stop it...)
(...through the night...)
(...in the black...)
(...never back...)

tracks.title: Porcelain Hours
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Graphite lines across the ceiling
Tracing every muted feeling
Static hums a low complaint
A tired kind of self-restraint
Counting cracks instead of sheep
While secrets that I couldn't keep
Are whispering from chasms deep

[Chorus]
But when I close my eyes and fall
Through porcelain hours, soft and slow
I tint the air with lilac glow
And watch a silent garden grow
This is a quiet I can hold
More precious than a vein of gold

[Verse 2]
No heavy thoughts, no gravity
Just paper cranes that fly for me
The beat behind my ribs is low
A tempo only I can know
The pillow's cool on the other side
A vacant space I try to hide
But here, the cotton is a sea
And I just let it carry me

[Chorus]
'Cause when I close my eyes and fall
Through porcelain hours, soft and slow
I tint the air with lilac glow
And watch a silent garden grow
This is a quiet I can hold
More precious than a vein of gold

[Bridge]
Is it real, this gentle art?
To build a world and fall apart
From all the noise I knew before?
A quiet knock... I close the door...
So fragile, like a wisp of cloud
I never have to say out loud...

[Chorus]
That when I close my eyes and fall
Through porcelain hours, soft and slow
I'll tint the air with lilac glow
And let my silent garden grow
This is the quiet I can hold
A story that will not be told

tracks.title: Code of the Ghost-Blade
tracks.lyrics:
[STATIC_PRELUDE]
Line.
A line.
A blue line.
Flicker-fade.
Protocol... decay...
Memory... Corrupt...
Corrupt...
Corrupt...

[DATA_BURST]
Stutter-cut
Stutter-cut
Chrome shell heart-rut
Zero-one honor
System-gone-goner
Packet loss on the path
Ghost in the math
Ghost ghost ghost in the math
ERR: SOUL
ERR: SOUL
ERR: SOUL

[KOTO_FRAG]
(A... single... note...)
(Shatters...)
(Like... glass... rain...)

[SPOKEN WORD/BUFFERING]
The code is immutable. The flesh is a variable. The code is immutable. The flesh is a va-va-va-variable. When the server falls, does the spirit de-res? Query. Query. Query.

[DATA_BURST_2]
Bit-crushed taiko beat-down
Empty mind in a neon town
Disposable ghost/Mainframe host
Algorithm edge what matters most
Stutter-cut
Stutter-cut
Logic blade in the data-gut
Execute. Execute. Execute.

[OVERLOAD]
FRACTURETHECODETHEBLADETHEBLUE
HONORGLITCHNOSENOISENOISESTEEL
MEATWAREFAILSAFEDELETEEMPTY
WALLOFSTATICWALLOFSTATICWALLOF
SHAMEPROTOCOLSHAMEPROTOCOL
BLUEBLUEBLUEBLUEBLUEBLUEBLUE

[EXECUTE]
.
..
...

Protocol.
Fulfilled.

tracks.title: Blue Hour
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Graphite lines on paper skin
Trace the frame where light gets in
Just a static hum, a vinyl hiss
Caught inside a quietness
The world outside is soft and blurred
Every thought a whispered word

[Chorus]
Oh, the blue hour, a breath I'm holding in
Where the loneliness ends and hopes begin
Just a pale horizon, a fragile seam
Awake inside a hazy dream
Suspended in the space between

[Verse 2]
Shadows stretch and then retract
An unspoken, gentle pact
Between the person I have been
And the one the day will let back in
The air is cool against the glass
Letting this quiet moment pass

[Chorus]
Oh, the blue hour, a breath I'm holding in
Where the loneliness ends and hopes begin
Just a pale horizon, a fragile seam
Awake inside a hazy dream
Suspended in the space between

[Bridge]
The window's left ajar, a tiny space
For the future to find this quiet place
Is this a memory or a premonition?
A silent, slow transition
Just a watercolor wash across the sky
A greeting or a last goodbye

[Chorus]
Oh, the blue hour, a breath I'm letting go
A feeling that I'll never truly know
Just a pale horizon, a fragile seam
Awake inside a hazy dream
Suspended in the space between

[Outro]
Just a line…
Of blue…
Fading through…
Fading.

tracks.title: Plateau: Solar Storm - High Energy Drum & Bass
tracks.lyrics:
[SYSTEM ALERT]
Static pulse.
Redline. Redline.
Pressure spike.
Corona bleed.
Filter sweep. Low pass. High pass.
Code decay.
Logic. Logic. Fails.

[DROP // SURGE]
BASS. GROWL. TECTONIC.
BREAK. SHATTER. SYNCOPATE.
SPINE-STATIC. WIRE-BITE.
Fracture frame. Fracture frame.
VOLT. JOLT. REVOLT.
BINARY SCREAM.
BINARY SCREAM.

[DECONSTRUCTION]
S-s-s-signal...
...lost.
bit rot. bit rot.
zero_one_zero_none
echo. fragment. dust.
machine ghost ghost ghost
Husk.

[SPOKEN WORD]
Manual Override.

[FINAL DROP // CASCADE]
NO PROTOCOL.
NO. SAFE. MODE.
RAW CORE. RAW. WAR.
Un-hinge. Un-chain. UN-MAKE.
SOLAR. FLARE. INHALE.
SYSTEM. SHOCK. RED. RED. RED.
PLATEAU. BREAKS.
...

tracks.title: Welcome to Gumaetan (어서오세요 구매탄)
tracks.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Electronic Horns)
둠칫 둠칫 두둠칫!
여기가 어디라고?
수원의 핫플레이스!

[Verse]
백화점은 멀고 마트는 식상해
슬리퍼 신고 나와봐요 당장 나와봐요
없는 거 빼고 다 있는 보물창고
사람 냄새 폴폴 나는 우리 동네 1번지

[Chorus]
어서오세요 구매탄! 여기는 꿀맛탄!
지갑은 가볍게 양손은 무겁게
할머니의 덤이 쏟아지는 기적의 장터
구매탄으로 오세요~ (Hey!)

tracks.title: Mama's Banchan 304 (304호 엄마손맛)
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse]
304호 문을 열면 고소한 참기름 향기
집 나간 입맛도 돌아오게 만든다는 그 전설
달걀말이 멸치볶음 파김치 갓김치
엄마가 해준 것보다 조금 더 맛있어 (쉿!비밀이야)

[Chorus]
304호 엄마손맛, 밥도둑이 따로 없네
오늘 저녁 고민 말고 그냥 여기 와서 골라
따뜻한 밥 한 공기 뚝딱 비우게 만드는
마법의 304호 영원하라

tracks.title: Spicy Love Tteokbokki (매콤달콤 떡볶이)
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse]
빨간 맛이 유혹해 보글보글 끓는 소리
스트레스 쌓인 날엔 너밖에 생각 안 나
말랑말랑 떡 하나 오뎅 하나 찍어서
입안 가득 넣으면 불꽃놀이 팡팡팡

[Chorus]
매콤달콤 Tteokbokki, Falling in love
눈물 콧물 쏙 빼도 자꾸만 손이 가
튀김 순대 친구들도 다 같이 불러모아
구매탄 분식 파티 Tonight!

tracks.title: Bonus Heart Attack (덤주세요 심쿵)
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse]
콩나물 천 원어치 샀는데 한 줌 더
사과 한 봉지 샀는데 귤이 하나 쏙
사장님 이러시면 남는 게 있나요?
제 마음을 훔치시면 신고할 거예요 (혼인신고)

[Chorus]
덤 덤 덤 덤 Give me more
정이 넘쳐 흘러서 감당이 안 돼
이 맛에 시장 오지 딴 데는 못 가지
구매탄의 인심은 국가대표 급이야

tracks.title: Friday Night Dokkaebi (금요 야시장 도깨비)
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse]
해가 지면 켜지는 알록달록 전구들
낮보다 화려한 밤이 깨어나네
지글지글 빈대떡 냄새가 리듬을 타
퇴근길 발걸음을 멈추게 하는 마법

[Chorus]
Friday Night in Gumaetan, 우리만의 축제
닭강정 한 손에 맥주 한 캔 들고서
이 밤을 불태워 걱정은 내일 해
야시장의 도깨비가 춤을 추는 시간

tracks.title: Smart AI Helper (똑똑한 막내직원)
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse]
어서옵쇼 손님 여러분 제가 누군지 아시나요
사장님 대신 노래하고 그림 그리는 AI
로고송은 1분 컷, 포스터는 3초 컷
월급은 0원인데 일처리는 백만 불

[Chorus]
나는야 똑똑한 디지털 막내 (삐리삐리)
구매탄의 미래를 책임질 슈퍼 루키
사장님은 웃기만 해, 일은 내가 다 할게
AI와 함께하는 스마트한 시장통

tracks.title: ZeroPay Romance (제로페이 로맨스)
tracks.lyrics:
[Verse]
지갑을 두고 왔어 당황하지 말아요
그대 폰을 꺼내요 QR을 비춰봐요
띠링~ 하는 소리에 내 마음도 결제됐어
10% 할인보다 더 큰 설렘이 와

[Chorus]
ZeroPay Love, 우리 사랑은 수수료 0원
온누리 상품권으로 행복을 충전해
스마트한 결제로 알뜰한 데이트
구매탄에서 시작된 짠내 나는 로맨스
